description: Base class for all observations recorded on spatial features

observationDate.description: Captures the point in time of the observation in ISO date format (including time zone). UTC expected.

phenomenonTime.description: Optionally provides the date/time period over which the observation is expected to apply.

feature.description: A link and/or identifier to the feature to which this Observation applies.

holding.description: If the observation is associated with a Holding Resource, an ID or link to this resource.

responsible.description: The person or other entity responsible for this observation.

remark.description: A comment, note, or structured remark for this observation.
